name: Tom'sDailyPhotographyandFilm-makingtips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Tom's daily photography and filmmaking tips are your daily dose of easy to use tips that will help you improve on your photography and filmmaking skills one episode at a time!

It doesn't matter if you're a newbie or a seasoned professional who makes a living in this creative space. Anyone who has a passion to create with the camera will find useful, insightful, and practical information in this Flash Briefing.

New episodes go live each morning at 9 a.m. CST. 

Each episode will be dedicated to either photography and filmmaking and will cover topics such as camera techniques, composition, camera settings, camera gear, and even tips on how to jump-start your career in this industry.

Enable it now!

Tom Shu is an Asian American filmmaker and photographer. He spent five years in corporate healthcare consulting at a Fortune 10 company before discovering his passion for photography and filmmaking. He has worked with brands such as Google Pixel, Passion Passport, Prague Tourism Board, and PrAna and has produced an award-winning short documentary Spirit of Matsu.

If you have any questions at all about what we have covered, or suggestions on what you would like to hear in future episodes, please contact me on Instagram @tom.shu.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
